channel-type.label: Multi-Press Complete Trigger
channel-type.description: This trigger shall indicate 2 numeric fields as a JSON object. The first is the new value of the CurrentPosition attribute, i.e. while pressed. The second is how many times the momentary switch has been pressed in a multi-press sequence.
